name: ToggleButtonsTheme
desc: An inherited widget that defines color and border parameters for [ToggleButtons] in this widget's subtree.

fields.name: data
fields.desc: Specifies the color and border values for descendant [ToggleButtons] widgets.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of ToggleButtonsTheme
desc: You can specify the ToggleButtonsThemeData properties to set default styles for descendant ToggleButtons components, such as border style, color, decoration, etc. You can also use ToggleButtonsTheme.of to get the theme data of ToggleButtons.
